After 1000 hours of playing CSGO my opinion on this game is that this game is awesome, everything is just amazing and i find only two negative thing. First is that the rank system is just a piece of sh*t, I win twelve times on row (dont get rank up), and then loss two games and I get derank. The second thing is that there are too many cheaters, on prime acc is not that bad but on non-prime is just terrible, cheaters are everywhere. But despite of this all the CSGO was and will be always perfect game in which I experienced all the feelings, the sadness of losing, the happiness of winning or just the joy of playing. It always cheer me up when I was sad and it always held my back. I spent four years on csgo and it never stopped or will never stop amuse me. CSGO will forever be my favorite game that I will be happy everytime to turn on. Becouse its the most amazing game that I ever plays.
